original_title: G. C. E. O/L Examination dates announced
original_body_lines: COLOMBO (News 1st); The 2022 G. C. E. O/L exam will take place from 29th May to 8th June, said the Department of Examinations.
In a statement, the Department of Examination introduced several telephone numbers and an email for inquiries.
CT Scans at Karapitiya malfunction; Patients directed to private hospitals
